altTitles.en: The Bride of the God of Magic

description.en:
After CEO Qi's death, he crossed over to a different world. He originally thought that he was a savior, only when he got dressed up and sent to the wedding bed, did he realise that he became the bride for the devil! When faced with a frivolous and doting devil, when exactly can the cold and aloof CEO give birth?!

---
After being murdered, the CEO of Qi's Group travels to an otherworldly land and becomes its Savior. The only way to save the world is to become the wife of the God of Desire and awaken the power of new life with him?!

---
**Original Web Comic:** [AC.QQ](https://ac.qq.com/Comic/comicInfo/id/649185), [BiliBili Manhua](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc30514), [IQIYI](https://www.iqiyi.com/manhua/detail_1aedr7uj5bp.html), [KuaiKan Manhua](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/8386)

**Official English Translations:** [INKR Comics](https://inkr.com/ik-title-688), [WebComics](http://www.webcomicsapp.com/comic/612dda758c252b0ce439d134)
